name: Communityre-walkSmarttap
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: physio tap
des:
This is the Alexa skill that trains the rehabilitating patients with playing the game with Echo Button

There are two games in this Alexa skill: Reaction Time and Dual Task

Reaction time: This is the game to train the reaction time of rehabilitating patients. Player will be asked to press the lighted up button to train their reaction time. After start the skill by calling "Open Physio tap" and activating the buttons, user can say "Reaction Time Training" to play that game.

Dual Task: This is the game to train the dual task ability (walking and observing) of rehabilitating patients. The game plays with a setup that buttons are placed about 10 - 15 meters apart from start point. When each game round start, player needs to walks towards the buttons. In the mean time buttons will light up in sequence. User need to press the correct sequence to win the game.
After start the skill by calling "Open Physio tap" and activating the buttons, user can say "Dual task" to enter the game. Before game start, player will be asked to do the calibration by walking to the buttons at start point and pressing the lighted up button. Then the game will start and the player can play by following the Cantonese instruction.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
